A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney ruined Star Wars should be the headline. The story is based on nothing (think about what the missions and outcomes were)\, characters don’t haven chemistry and are forced to kiss. The exciting Jedi training is cut out. My childhood idol\, Luke Skywalker\, is washed up and can’t act the way Disney is pushing his character. He is made into being the sole comic relief scene for each segment . Admiral Holdo’s purple hair reminds me of the 80’s and Hunger Games. No emotional attachment to the Series anymore. The complex technology seems to get worse with time. The complexity of the planets\, character interactions and theme are dumbed down like an “Address the People” statement done by George W. Bush. Great movie for the 6-14 year old but everyone else loses out.
